content.text: The Nieders√§chsische Online-Archiv (NOA) serves to store and provide access to online publications from and about Lower Saxony.

metadataPolicy.text: All bibliographic metadata provided via this interface is hereby made available under CC0 license, free to share and re-use.

dataPolicy.text: The data and electronic documents provided here must be used according to copyright laws, all rights reserved if not otherwise explicitly specified.
